task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_title: Innovatech Employee Wellness: Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break Interest Survey
task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_introduction_text: Innovatech Solutions is committed to enhancing employee well-being. We are considering introducing a 'Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break' and would greatly appreciate your input to tailor this potential program to your needs. Please take a few minutes to complete this short survey; your feedback is valuable!

survey_questions.question_text: How interested are you in participating in a 15-20 minute guided 'Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break' offered twice a week?
Which days of the week would you most likely be able to attend such a session? (Select all that apply)
What time of day would be most convenient for you to participate in a 15-20 minute session? (Select all that apply)
What aspect of the 'Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break' are you most interested in?
What, if any, are your primary concerns or potential barriers to participating in such a program? (Select all that apply)
options: Prefer to use my break differently

survey_questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' for potential barriers in the previous question, please specify:
Do you have any other suggestions or comments regarding the proposed 'Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break' program?

task_2_satisfaction_data_analysis.recommendation_for_next_year: To improve next year's Step Challenge, consider offering more prize categories and enhancing the mobile app, as these were key suggestions. Continuing the popular team competition element is also recommended to maintain high engagement.
